scripts.build: yarn workspace @unipasswallet/popup-types build && yarn workspace @unipasswallet/popup-utils build && yarn workspace @unipasswallet/popup-sdk build && yarn workspace @unipasswallet/ethereum-provider build
scripts.publish: yarn workspace @unipasswallet/popup-types publish && yarn workspace @unipasswallet/popup-utils publish && yarn workspace @unipasswallet/popup-sdk publish
